title: Reading the Stars
overview: Come ‘read the stars' with Antoni Bumba! This new, weekly vodcast takes a mystical, campy, and hilarious dive into a different topic each week, tailored around her guest's "Big Three" (astrological signs). Nothing is off limits as Antoni invites guests into her "living quarters" for a conversation around culture, astrology, fan submissions, and whatever else pops into her mind that week. You've heard of "reading the stars" – but have you ever had someone actually "read" … the stars? Tune in to see ;) Call 424-248-5191 to leave a message on the show's dedicated voicemail and have your questions answered by Antoni and her guests in upcoming episodes!
